original_title: PANDA MOONWALK or WHY MENG MENG WALKS BACKWARDS
overview: In 2017, China loaned the two panda bears Meng Meng and Jiao Qing to the Berlin Zoo. However, this for-profit attraction didn't go as planned: Meng Meng, the female panda, will only walk backwards. Kerstin Honeit's video places Meng Meng's protest in a series with other performances of protesting bodies, in which grievances are made visible in public.
title: PANDA MOONWALK or WHY MENG MENG WALKS BACKWARDS
